## Breaking Down the Numbers: A Look at Tariq Woolen's Season Stats
| Category | Stat |
| --- | --- |
| Games Played | 17 |
| Tackles | 75 |
| Interceptions | 6 |
| Passes Defensed | 15 |
| Fines | 1 |

The numbers tell an interesting story. Tariq Woolen has been a key player for the Seahawks this season, with 75 tackles and 6 interceptions. However, his fine for taunting is a reminder that even the best players can make mistakes.

## Reaction from the Seahawks Camp: What They're Saying About Tariq Woolen's Fine
The Seahawks have been tight-lipped about the incident, but sources close to the team suggest that they are disappointed but not surprised by the fine. "Tariq is a competitive player who wears his heart on his sleeve," said one teammate. "We know he'll learn from this and move on."

## FAQ
Q: How much was Tariq Woolen fined?
A: The amount of the fine has not been disclosed.
Q: Will Tariq Woolen's fine affect his playing time in the Super Bowl?
A: It's unlikely, but the Seahawks may take his behavior into account when making their lineup decisions.
Q: What can Tariq Woolen do to avoid similar incidents in the future?
A: He can work on his emotional control and avoid engaging with opponents in a way that could be perceived as taunting.
